body_html:
@cy89 @ppwwyyxx Thanks, Maybe I should provide an parameter to specific whether to drop the last batch or not.
@ppwwyyxx But in my case, The problem is not whether to use a small batch size or not to fetch the last batch.I can't fetch the last batch in multigpu model.If I use only one gpu and the problem doesn't exist, because Dataset API will provide the last batch with a smaller batch.
#12855
